TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Module ModuleResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ModuleResolveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ModuleResolveEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ResolveEventArgs) As Module
public delegate System::Reflection::Module ^ ModuleResolveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ResolveEventArgs ^ e);
type ModuleResolveEventHandler = delegate of obj * ResolveEventArgs -> Module

param.name: sender
param.span: Ensamblado que constituía el origen del evento.

span.span: The assembly that was the source of the event.

param.name: e
param.span: Argumentos proporcionados por el objeto que describe el evento.

span.span: The arguments supplied by the object describing the event.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .
The module that satisfies the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el cargador de clases de common language runtime no puede resolver una referencia a un módulo interno de un ensamblado por medios normales, se genera este evento.If the common language runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an internal module of an assembly through normal means, this event is raised. El controlador de eventos para este delegado debe localizar y devolver un módulo que satisface la solicitud.The event handler for this delegate must locate and return a module that satisfies the request. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra la secuencia de ejecución en el que se llama a un controlador de eventos.The following example demonstrates the sequence of execution in which an event handler is called. En este ejemplo, Server1 es un módulo externo de la clase MySample.In this example, Server1 is an external module of the MySample class. ### Para compilar y ejecutar el ejemploTo compile and run the example 1. Abra una ventana del símbolo del sistema y desplácese al directorio que contiene MySample.cs.Open a Command Prompt window and navigate to the directory that contains MySample.cs. 2. Compile Server1 mediante el comando siguiente:Compile Server1 using the following command: ```console csc /out:subfolder\Server1.netmodule /t:module Server1.cs ``` 3. Compile MySample mediante el comando siguiente:Compile MySample using the following command: ```console csc /out:MySample.exe /t:exe /addmodule:subfolder\Server1.netmodule MySample.cs ``` 4. Ejecute MySample.exe.Run MySample.exe. > [!NOTE] > El archivo de módulo Server1.netmodule debe estar en un subdirectorio denominado "subcarpeta" para este ejemplo funcione correctamente.The module file Server1.netmodule must be in a subdirectory named "subfolder" for this example to work properly.
